doc.title: Missing Parents
doc.plot: A young teens parents are so fed up with his irresponsible behavior they go off alone to a camp in the woods, leaving him with the house and a credit card. At first he throws wild parties and behaves just as he wants but soon he realizes there is more to life than this and that he misses his parents. So he cleans up his act, goes to work at his fathers business, and hires a private detective to find them. The problem is - they are enjoying themselves and don't want to come back!
